Championships Auto Racing Teams CART--Named James Alan Henderson to the board of directors.
Northern League SCHAUMBURG FLYERS--Signed RHP Joe Klancnik and INF Larry Bethea.

National Football League CINCINNATI BENGALS--Waived CB Roosevelt Blackmon, OL Tony Coats, S Gary Thompkins, WR Tariq McDonald and WR Eddie Hardaway. DETROIT LIONS--Signed TE Alfred Pupunu. Released QB Steve Stenstrom. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Waived RB Curtis Alexander, TE Carlos Nuno and DT Noel Scarlett. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Waived WR Vincent Brisby, WR Tony Gaiter, WR Matt Bumgardner, WR Aaron Bailey, S Cory Gilliard, S Rodney Rideau, CB Mike Woods and TE Dave Spachelski. Signed WR Chris Calloway. NEW YORK JETS--Waived CB Buddy Crutchfield, P Andy Russ, T Anthony Byrd, T Mark Bristol, WR Cory Peterson, S Jonathon Eaton and LB Dax Strohmeyer.
National Hockey League COLORADO AVALANCHE--Re-signed C Joe Sakic to a one-year contract. SAN JOSE SHARKS--Signed D Greg Andrusak. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Re-signed C Ryan Johnson to a one-year contract.

ARKANSAS-LITTLE ROCK--Named Bambi Ferguson and Brooks Donald women's assistant basketball coaches. Promoted women's graduate assistant basketball coach Johnnie Harris to women's assistant basketball coach. ARMY--Named Ron Wigger rifle coach. BRADLEY--Named Tasha McDowell women's assistant basketball coach. BRYN MAWR--Named Diane Hagan volleyball coach. CLEMSON--Named Laura Slice assistant rowing coach. DUKE--Named Art Chase associate sports information director. FRANKLIN & MARSHALL--Named Jay Gallagher coordinator of recreational sports. HASTINGS--Named Ken Fike women's golf coach. HEIDELBERG--Named Missy Roggow softball coach and women's assistant basketball coach. MINNESOTA-MANKATO--Named Suzy Venet women's assistant basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA-ASHEVILLE--Named Gregory Schmind men's assistant soccer coach and Christine Geske women's assistant soccer coach. PENNSYLVANIA--Announced the resignation of Gordie Ernst, men's tennis coach. ROBERTS WESLEYAN--Named Jason Blom men's assistant basketball coach and sports information director. SOUTH ALABAMA--Named Daniel Brizard women's assistant soccer coach. STEVENS TECH--Named Terry Small assistant athletic director and sports information director. TEMPLE--Announced the resignation of Brian Kirschner, sports media relations director. UTICA--Named Darin Lynch women's volleyball coach. VALDOSTA STATE--Named Todd Sheppard men's assistant basketball coach and Earnest Brown men's graduate assistant basketball coach.
